availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Commodore P. Browning (Bath County, Kentucky, physician. & surgeon 20th KY Inf USA)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, physician. Fleming County, Kentucky, native. Married to Cinderella Trumbo Browning in Bath County on September 1, 1856. Physician in Bath County in 1860. Served in the 20th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a surgeon.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 64.
Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Bethel, Enumeration District 0003, p. 14.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000216816, p. 34 (on microfilm), (accessed via Ancestry.com).
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Kentucky, 1904, Application #811-413.
